item.description:
Hi -

I spoke too soon. You do need the invoice printed out to be seated. Below is the invoice for Cissy and Donna. I'll send Charlene hers also.

When we arrive, we should let them know we need a table for 6 for all of us (Susan Collins, Charlene, Cissy, Donna plus Bernice and Aiden.) See you tonight!



-----Original Message-----
From: regattabartix@getshowtix.com [mailto:regattabartix@getshowtix.com]
Sent: Thursday, July 17, 2008 12:10 PM
To: Susan Collins
Subject: Regatta Bar Ticket Purchase

THANK YOU FOR PURCHASING TICKETS TO A SHOW AT THE REGATTABAR. PLEASE NOTE
THAT YOUR CREDIT CARD WILL BE CHARGED BY GETSHOWTIX.COM / NY.

Below is your order confirmation:

ORDER NUMBER: 2008071711090965
----------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------
SHOW TITLE : Negroni's Trio
SHOW DATE : 2008-07-17
SHOW TIME : 7:30PM
# of TICKETS: 2
ORDER TOTAL : $35.00
CARD NUMBER : xxxx xxxx xxxx 1009
COUPON NUMBER :
----------------------------------------------
FIRST NAME : Susan
LAST NAME : Collins
ADDRESS : 15 Sanborn Ave
: Apt 2L
: Somerville, MA 02143
: USA
E-MAIL : scollins@pathfind.org
TELEPHONE : 617-780-0429

Please print this confirmation and bring it along with you the night of the show.
This order is non-refundable.

Seating is assigned based on the time of your ticket purchase.

Please arrive at The Regattabar at least fifteen minutes prior to the
showtime so you can be seated before the show starts.

IF YOU HAVE ORDERED TICKETS LESS THAN 2 HOURS PRIOR TO SHOWTIME, YOU MUST
PRINT OUT AND PRESENT THIS CONFIRMATION FOR ADMISSION.

As a bonus to our patrons, please enjoy a 10% discount on your meal at Henrietta's Table.*
*10% Discount applies to food and non-alcoholic beverages only.

THERE IS NO DRESS CODE AT THE REGATTABAR

ALL SHOWS ARE OPEN TO ALL AGES

Negroni Trio
Date(s): Thursday, July 17, 2008

SUPER PUERTO RICAN
NEGRONI TRIO features the florid keyboard style of Puerto Rican jazz pianist Jos√© Negroni in a supercharged ensemble with his Berklee-educated son Nomar on drums and bassist Marco Panascia | Regattabar, Charles Hotel, 1 Bennett St, Cambridge | 7:30 pm | $15 | 617.395.7757 or www.regattabarjazz.com.
item.name: Regatta Bar - Super Puerto Rican Negroni's Trio
